section.title: Removing Subnets from External Provider Logical Networks
section.para: Remove a subnet from a logical network provided by an external provider.

procedure.title: Removing Subnets from External Provider Logical Networks

step.para: Click the logical network provided by an external provider from which the subnet will be removed.
Click the Subnets tab in the details pane.
Click the Remove button and click OK when prompted.
